Episodes.Title: To Me, My X-Men
Episodes.Writer: Beau DeMayo, Mariah Wilson, Stan Lee
Episodes.Actors: Ray Chase, Jennifer Hale, Alison Sealy-Smith
Episodes.Plot: Cyclops races to find the source of new anti-mutant technology.

Episodes.Title: Mutant Liberation Begins
Episodes.Writer: Beau DeMayo, Stan Lee, Jack Kirby
Episodes.Actors: Matthew Waterson, Ray Chase, Jennifer Hale
Episodes.Plot: When Magneto is forced by the UN to stand trial, a group of anti-mutant rioters test his resolve.

Episodes.Title: Fire Made Flesh
Episodes.Writer: Beau DeMayo, Charley Feldman, Mariah Wilson
Episodes.Actors: Jennifer Hale, Ray Chase, Chris Britton
Episodes.Plot: When a visitor arrives at the mansion with a dangerous secret that threatens Cyclops and Jean's relationship, the team is propelled into a tragic confrontation with an immortal mad scientist.

Episodes.Title: Motendo/Lifedeath - Part 1
Episodes.Writer: Beau DeMayo, Charley Feldman, Mariah Wilson
Episodes.Actors: Holly Chou, Gil Birmingham, Gui Agustini
Episodes.Plot: On her birthday, a nostalgic Jubilee is forced to relive the X-Men's greatest adventures when an entertainment system transports her into a 16-bit video game.

Episodes.Title: Remember It
Episodes.Writer: Beau DeMayo, Mariah Wilson, Stan Lee
Episodes.Actors: Lenore Zann, A.J. LoCascio, Ray Chase
Episodes.Plot: As Genosha prepares to join the UN, select members of the team head to the island nation to be honorees. Back at the mansion, a behind-the-scenes press event risks airing the X-Men's dirty laundry.

Episodes.Title: Lifedeath - Part 2
Episodes.Writer: Charley Feldman, Stan Lee, Jack Kirby
Episodes.Actors: Ross Marquand, Morla Gorrondona, Alison Sealy-Smith
Episodes.Plot: Storm is forced to face her worst fears in order to free herself.

Episodes.Title: Bright Eyes
Episodes.Writer: Charley Feldman, JB Ballard, Mariah Wilson
Episodes.Actors: Ray Chase, Lenore Zann, Jennifer Hale
Episodes.Plot: Cyclops focuses the X-Men on finding Bolivar Trask. However, when the team locates the Sentinel inventor, they realize that they all have been played by a mastermind.

Episodes.Title: Tolerance Is Extinction - Part 1
Episodes.Writer: Beau DeMayo, Anthony Sellitti, Stan Lee
Episodes.Actors: Jennifer Hale, Ray Chase, Chris Potter
Episodes.Plot: The X-Men must unite to face a new threat.

Episodes.Title: Tolerance Is Extinction - Part 2
Episodes.Writer: Anthony Sellitti, Ashley Alvarez, Mariah Wilson
Episodes.Actors: Ross Marquand, Ray Chase, George Buza
Episodes.Plot: The X-Men work to settle the score before it is too late.

Episodes.Title: Tolerance Is Extinction - Part 3
Episodes.Writer: Beau DeMayo, Anthony Sellitti, Ashley Alvarez
Episodes.Actors: Ross Marquand, Matthew Waterson, Theo James
Episodes.Plot: The X-Men's dream is put to the test as mutant-human relations reach a tipping point.
